metadata.title: CVE-2023-20863 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In spring framework versions prior to 5.2.24 release+ ,5.3.27+ and 6.0.8+ ,it is possible for a user to provide a specially crafted SpEL expressionthat may cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

criterions.comment: libspring-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
